lender.name: Kevin and Amanda Conlin
lender.loan_because: because we can.
lender.occupational_info: I help run the apartments on a college campus by helping residents get academic support, meet other people in their communities, and help them to rectify any neighbor disagreements which may arise. lender.name: Jes
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference. I feel that a life spent without helping anyone you don't even know is a life wasted. That's why I loan

lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good to help out people that need so much.

lender.name: Izabela
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a little help sometimes.

lender.name: YC Lee
lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense !
lender.occupational_info: As a lawyer, I help people to understand and assert their rights. I value fair-play and support humane and eco-friendly causes.

lender.name: Larry E
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do!

lender.name: James V Jackson II
lender.loan_because: This is a way to give back what God has blessed me with.
lender.occupational_info: I help business owners grow their business by connecting buyers to businesses that advertise on the internet.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I am passionate about sharing what little I have with those around the world who are struggling to make ends meet and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the Vancouver Organizing Committee for the 2010 Olympic and Paralympic Winter Games. I am in charge of developing and delivering all sport-specific publications for the Games

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: The money I loan is not my own but the gifts of my gracious Lord. God has blessed me with the ability to lend to others and I pray my lending will glorify my Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

lender.name: Vivehananthan
lender.loan_because: desire to help poor people to succeed in their ventures and have a better living.

lender.occupational_info: stressful

lender.name: Darren & Teresa
lender.loan_because: We live in a country where credit, food, water and electricity are in abundance. A little spare-cash can create significant opportunity in countries less wealthy than our own.
lender.occupational_info: Darren works in natural resource management (surface water resources, altered hydrology and impacts). Teresa is a Barrister in Perth.

lender.name: Marlon
lender.loan_because: I want to help small business as my mom was in to it

lender.name: Derick Schnetler
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do if you can...

lender.name: Donnie
lender.occupational_info: boring

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who are trying to help themselves by providing access to capital.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help people get out of poverty and improve their living conditions. I would like to encourage everyone throughout the world to read "Up from Slavery" by Booker T. Washington. You can read it on the internet. It shows a path out of poverty that applies to people of all cultures and backgrounds. Develop your skills, don't drink or do drugs, and live simply and hopefully poverty will be a thing of the past soon. mg

lender.name: Paul
lender.occupational_info: Mechanic

lender.name: G.Jagdiesh
lender.loan_because: I believe in the cause KIVA has undertaken and this was something I wanted to do.

lender.loan_because: I'm a firm believer in the principle of self-help.
lender.occupational_info: We help people manage their own money.

lender.name: David.
lender.loan_because: I care passionately about helping the less fortunate, I don't want to be rewarded for my actions, I want to make a difference, because that's where life changes for people, when we act.
lender.occupational_info: I Strive to Educate people that it's better to give to the needy than to take and be greedy, our actions here on Earth will eventually be Judged by God the Almighty, Life on Earth is Short, Eternity is Forever, what's ahead for YOU Depends on What you do Today.

lender.name: Norazridza
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel great for being able to help others around the globe.

lender.loan_because: We want to share our luck (to have more money than we need for our daily needs) with people who are less fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: Bernadetta is translating legal texts from different european languages into her mother-tongue (polish), Andreas is consulting private and communal forest-owners in the management of their forests.

lender.name: Darlene
lender.loan_because: I care for those who are less fortunate than I.

lender.name: Charan Kumar
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their will to help others.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: Noblesse oblige

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It is a purposeful use of money - a tangible way to demonstrate faith in real people who are disadvantaged not by desire, or ability or effort, but by circumstance.
lender.occupational_info: I am an elected municipal Councillor in Huntsville and Muskoka and I am the Materials Sales Manager for Fowler Construction

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: My sister gave me the very special gift of my own Kiva account for lending.

lender.name: Mat
lender.loan_because: my small contribution, when combined with others, can make a big different someone's life.

lender.name: Lindon 16th Scouts
lender.loan_because: We are a scout troop living in Lindon, Utah. We believe that when you do an act of goodness, you never see the end of it. We have worked hard to raise this money and want to use it to help others who want to work hard to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: We are students in our local schools and our local scout troop. We know that we can do a lot to bring about some good things in this world.

lender.occupational_info: sou cabeleleireira e gostaria muito de podr ampliar meu salão com produtos e maquinarios,amo o q eu faço.

lender.loan_because: I like the idea of bringing together lending demand and supply without any biased interests

lender.name: Barbie
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance!

lender.name: Candy
lender.loan_because: I believe that those who have enough have a responsibility to help those who don't.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I've been helped in the past and the best way to repay their kindness is to help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I fix the company computer equipment when it breaks. I help fellow coworkers figure out the best way to complete a project.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Supporting entrepreneurs is the best way to lift a country out of poverty.

lender.name: astrid7186
lender.occupation: youth education with a non-profit organisation
lender.loan_because: banks think in numbers, I think in people...
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non-profit organization in the environmental sector. I am responsible for their youth products and education. I help kids think 'greener'. Which is fun! :)

lender.name: Sara
lender.occupation: Court Appointed Special Advocate for Children

lender.name: Kressa
lender.loan_because: There is no better feeling in the world than being there for other people who need some help. I have had so many people help me, when I needed it, Its my turn to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I have a small store that I sell furniture out of. Most of the furniture is used, but in good condition. I also show horses in jumping competitions for a hobby

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I loan because I feel it is important to help others to improve their lives and the lives around them.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a grocery store putting peoples items into bags, sweep the floors, and get carts from the parking lot.

lender.name: Holy Cows of Ann Arbor
lender.occupational_info: The Holy Cows is the outgrowth of a class taken at the Unitarian Universalist Congregation in Ann Arbor seven years ago. We have stayed together as a group, we meet monthly and go away for a couple of weekends together each year. We are a multi-generational group of women encouraging each other, supporting each other and seeking to help others. We celebrate, laugh and cry together. We push each other to follow our dreams. KIVA provides us with an exciting opportunity for us to help very directly and that feels very good to us.

lender.name: Ashton
lender.loan_because: It helps to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Altruism aside, it's actually a lot of fun!
lender.occupational_info: I work for a mineral prospecting company. We send people around the world to look for metals in the ground. I help design the survey equipment.

lender.name: Gretchen
lender.loan_because: I am thankful I live in a country with opportunities to improve my life, and want to share that opportunity with other people.
lender.occupational_info: I help others take care of the land and air so it will be safe for people many years from now.

lender.name: Chris M
lender.loan_because: "If we each do a little, then we've all done a lot." (I can't believe I just came up with that.)
lender.occupational_info: I work in software maintenance and enjoy writing.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to help people--I own my own business but I had to completely start it up and establish it myself on an extremely limited budget. I think if people had access to easier forms of capital more people would be able to raise their standard of living.
lender.occupational_info: My company produces custom written content for academic and professional purposes in English.

lender.name: lynn
lender.loan_because: it is such an easy way to give. A $25 investment is nothing for us and goes so far.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I am loaning on behalf of Carlé Highschool. This loan is part of our student's effort to improve the community of the entire world.

lender.loan_because: I recognize God within every one of us.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a husband and stepfather, designer and multimedia producer, and recently unemployed. I grew up and live in PIttsburgh, PA, USA with my wife, sheltie, and 5 cats. I design websites, videos, animations, ads, logos, and brochures

lender.loan_because: I am able.

lender.occupational_info: I am a history teacher at a high school in the midwest.

lender.loan_because: This seems to be very good option to help out people in need.

lender.name: Elizabeth

lender.name: Global Resource Cycle
lender.loan_because: My partner and I support Kiva's mission to contribute to underdeveloped communities both locally and globally in order to promote economic sustainability.
lender.occupational_info: We are a nonprofit organization aimed at educating communities to sustain themselves and improve their quality of living, thereby increasing their opportunities to grow.

lender.name: Mike, Amy and girls
lender.loan_because: I can. Because we want to make a difference in the lives of others who may not be as fortunate.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It is the merest accident where we start out and what resources we have available to us. I started out by loaning in Peru in honor of my now late friend, Kent C. Day, who was once an archaeologist there. I have lent money to a group that bears my mother's name in Bolivia, and a coffin maker in Peru, in honor of my now late father, Gordon. Otherwise, I try to lend to women in Africa, where I think the money is able to do the most good.
lender.occupational_info: I teach philosophy to college students, while learning it myself.

lender.name: Kira & Chris
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Kira is a doctoral student at an American university. Chris works with computers.

lender.name: Tony

lender.occupational_info: I follow law changes that may affect my company's ability to sell its services.

lender.name: Stacey

lender.occupational_info: I help ensure the organization I work for keeps its employees, their health and wellbeing in mind in everything that they do.

lender.occupational_info: I sell circular saw blades used mostly for cutting wood.

lender.name: Byung-sam
lender.loan_because: When I was in philippine about three years ago, I saw a lot of people who want me to buy something to eat. At that time I didn't help them. I have been feeling regret for that things. So I decided to help them even though my amounts of money are very small.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student of univ. That's all.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: this is what democracy looks like
lender.occupational_info: 9000 years ago in Mexico's central valley indigenous people domesticated corn from a weed called teosinte. I study the genetic changes that happened during that domestication.

lender.name: Dave & Niki
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care.

lender.name: Aaltje
lender.loan_because: I would like to improve the living conditions of women in the third world.

lender.name: Shelley
lender.loan_because: Organizations like Kiva.org make sense - helping others to help themselves... and it always feels great to help someone in need.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: Actually, I am stopping loaning due to the fact that Kiva shows a contempt for the welfare of animals, supporting bloodsports such as cockfighting. Kiva needs to fix this.

lender.name: Drew
lender.loan_because: I used to be poor and now that I'm not, I want to help others like I was helped.
lender.occupational_info: I create logo's and take product photographs for my clients.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I come from the farm and want to help a farmer
lender.occupational_info: I help the oil and gas business define their problems and provide solutions

lender.name: Nedeljka
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving a chance for people to make their own futures, and to enable small businesses to grow and ultimately increase the beneficial development within a country.
lender.occupational_info: I study how to help countries build a healthy economy, society and government.

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I respect people who work hard for a living and want to help them succeed. I try to make my loans to people in agriculture or grocery stores since I have a background in those industries.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant. I help people know whether their business is profitable and help them find ways to cut costs and make more profit.

lender.name: Kathy
lender.loan_because: everybody deserves a chance to succeed!

lender.name: Tom & Dawn
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to prosper.
lender.occupational_info: Tom works for a pharmaceutical company developing new medicines. Dawn heals through massage therapy.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: people know how to best solve their own challenges.
lender.occupational_info: empower people just a bit more..

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: My educational background in gender & women studies, political science, and sociology enlightened me. I want to loan to women in small communities which will hopefully affect some sort of change for gender equality as a result of their economic prosperity as successful entrepreneurs.
lender.occupational_info: I put together the digital strategy for online, mobile, and tablet advertising campaigns.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I think loans show respect and trust and result in a stronger sense of connectedness and global brotherhood.
lender.occupational_info: I help sketch the broad system design that others fill out to solve business functions.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: Women have a more difficult time to raise funds and launch businesses, especially in poorer countries. I'll try and do what I can to help them become independent and successful.

lender.name: cojo
lender.loan_because: i like helping people
lender.occupational_info: school

lender.name: Free the Dream
lender.loan_because: It makes a positive difference. Loans educate the value of money. This program is self efficient while being very effective.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still figuring this out...??? What I do best is media marketing, video promotion. I am a visionary for creative innovation, and inspired inventions.

lender.name: Ailyna
lender.loan_because:
Year 2008 is year of ACTION. I am sick and tired of myself by just thinking and talking about my goal and my dream. 2008 is the year that I am going to put all my thoughts in action. Joining Kiva is one of the first action I am taking this year.
The first time I learned about Kiva was from the Oprah Winfrey Show while she was interviewing Bill Clinton, the former president of USA and the writer of “Giving”, who has cover Kiva in his book. And of course, there were also the founder of Kiva Matt and Jessica Flannery. I was touched by all their sharing.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an AWESOME way for me to INVEST what God has given to me! Matthew 25:14-30

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: an easy way to help someone!
lender.occupational_info: I am an inventory accountant that works for an airline. I analyze inventory of airplane engine parts.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: Life is short! I'd like to help make good things happen.
lender.occupational_info: I support independent media makers express themselves and reach an international audience.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I too am an entrepreneur and I want to help others to be successful too.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer programs for geologists.

lender.name: Dan & Karen
lender.loan_because: We love the Lord Jesus!!

lender.name: Deirdre
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have many things in life that others don't have. I can loan & it makes me feel good to know I'm helping others.

lender.name: YeongKi
lender.loan_because: happy world... healthy family....^^

lender.name: Mitchell
lender.loan_because: If I can give to help people less fortuate then myself, I'm happy to be able to do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an American Artist.

lender.name: turi
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I work at a visa sponsor for people to come to the U.S. for training and internship programs at companies and organizations in the U.S.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.occupation: Stay at Home Mom of 2, Doula

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: charity is not the solution to poverty. Empowering people to improve their life and their community is the only way to break the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Riley
lender.loan_because: It seems like a very easy and wonderful way to help somebody in need.
lender.occupational_info: I am a photographer. Currently I am a student. I love shooting portrait photography.

lender.name: Hilary
lender.loan_because: I'm a great believer in the power of microfinance both in terms of what it can achieve financially and in how it educates us about the lives of others. Kiva brings those lives into our homes and allows us to help, knowing that every loan, no matter how small, can make a huge difference.
lender.occupational_info: Getting more and more curious about the world the older I get :)

lender.name: Youngjoo
lender.loan_because: I want to see small but good work change the world better.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a professor in Jeonju, South Korea. My major is young children's mathematics. I believe in God.

lender.name: Emerson
lender.loan_because: It's an opportunity to spend some of my money with people who really needs and makes a good use of it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer teacher. But I like to work with music, arts and education.

lender.name: Damon
lender.occupation: Actor, waiter, volunteer and someday entrepreneur
lender.loan_because: I believe in microlending, fair trade, the power of a dream and the entrepreneurial spirit! Plus giving is good! :)
lender.occupational_info: I do lots of things: I wait on tables in a restaurant, I speak to lots of people at trade shows, I volunteer teaching English to immigrants in NY and I am trying to start my own business too

lender.name: Women On A Mission
lender.loan_because: We want to show our passion for compassion by helping those in need.
lender.occupational_info: We meet once a month to encourage each other and study the Bible.

lender.name: Rudi
lender.loan_because: I think more can be done to help people across the world, this is just one way to help people better their lives and the lives of their families.

lender.name: Alli
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone has the potential to succeed if they are given access.
lender.occupational_info: I am a University student

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: it feels good! :)

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: People have helped me when I've been in need.

lender.name: Betsy
lender.loan_because: Every parent should be able to watch their contented children sleeping securely each night.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am homeschooling my own children, but usually I am a primary school teacher.

lender.name: Cruiser Art Gallery
lender.loan_because: As a successful business we feel that it's appropriate to invest a portion of every sale by providing funds for small business entrepreneurs around the world. One percent of our gross sales is invested to help launch and expand small business enterprise in developing countries throughout the world, thanks to KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: Cruiser Art Gallery features prints of rusty old surfing cars (cruisers) in tropical Hawaiian beach settings. We are mindful that we are blessed to live in a country that rewards small business entrepreneurship and want to see similar business success result from KIVA loans made to individuals all around our world.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I received this as a gift. I have never of this website until I received the gift! I am very interested in this website and will look forward to loaning people money all across the world. I plan on recycling my money over and over again in hopes to help as many people as possible. I don't have much else to say other then I can't wait to get started!!
lender.occupational_info: I am in school.

lender.name: Nicci
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be in a situation that I can help somebody else and because I admire how everyone at kiva is building better lives for themselves and their loved ones. Good luck!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a manager in a computer business. But the work I love most is being a mother and looking after my home.

lender.name: Aaron Plaat
lender.loan_because:
I feel it is very important, as an entrepreneur, to invest in others who are taking a risk in order to better their life. In America, we have been very spoiled with a sense of entitlement rather than instilled with the value of hard work and determination.
"Love thy neighbor as you love thyself" is one of the key commandments in the Bible. I believe our neighbors are not just those around us, but those all over the world that we are able to help.
lender.occupational_info: As a recent graduate of The Ohio State University, I've had the opportunity to gain quite a bit of experience in the startup business world prior to graduating. These have given me a foundation to provide business consultation and web development services, while I still narrow in on my career options.

lender.name: Evonne
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others that wants to help themselves.

lender.name: nenita
lender.loan_because: because i want to build and inhance the capability of a person to improved there knowledge and know a lot through computer.
lender.occupational_info: I have my small business and I liked to have some more capital to improved and help other people.

lender.name: Brett
lender.occupational_info:
I am a graduate student in Asian studies with dual emphasis on Chinese and Economics. I also work for CSULB as a Chinese Braille Translator.
Currently I'm living in Taipei, Taiwan and studying Mandarin at NTNU's Mandarin Training Center.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: I hope it is a good way to expand the entrepreneurers' business and wealth.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: When I look at my life I have been so blessed, I just want to pay it forward. I believe our time on earth is intended to be spent making the world a better place than it would be if not for your existence.

lender.name: Rodrigo
lender.loan_because:
I need the loan to continue the work with the community in the interior of Bahia, Brazil, do not have professional photographic cameras and camcorders, and this complicates the issue of work. As the project works with poor people and with very low level of schooling, it is hard work and expand my projects.
Rodrigo Souza Itabuna, Bahia - Brazil
lender.occupational_info: The work consists of short films from editing as films, documentaries and music events in the community. Most actors who work are children and adolescents, talents that are discovered in the middle suburbs, many excluded from society. I have already filming ready, but not yet edited. I hope to have this collaboration and I am very happy to know the KIVA, here in Brazil just heard, I believe in the Kiva and I will announce to all my friends.

lender.name: Eddie
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a woodwind musician. I play saxophone, flute, and clarinet.

lender.name: In memory of Sayang
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward and help others help themselves.

lender.name: Darleta
lender.loan_because: I want to provide another human being with the tools to be able to successfully earn a living so that they will be able to raise themself and their family out of poverty.

lender.name: Ghulam Ashraf
lender.loan_because: To help the poor and needy to become self-sufficient, and be in a posiiton to help others
lender.occupational_info: Involved in Social upliftment, community development and nation building projects.

lender.name: John & Debby
lender.loan_because: I believe that we can best help people by making available the tools they need to become successful.
lender.occupational_info: Television production and Education

lender.name: Gwendolyn
lender.loan_because: I started by small business with $62 and it has grown steadily for 2 years. I can fully understand the support one needs just to help trigger a business or to live a dream. A seed funding goes a long way. Now I am rich, I want to be a blessing to people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: We are a social business reaching out and touching lives through performing and visual arts. We are a marketing voice to performers and artists in our nation - Singapore. We create an avenue for revenue for them by providing them consistent contracts so that they can earn a reasonable income for themselves and families. We are also passionately involved in musical / theatre production.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: This is my way of gifting the energy of prosperity to others who are seeking it so that it can spread around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I host a website on the internet that serves as a guide to anyone who is searching for practical and empowering ways to improve their lives from the inside out.

lender.name: Stephen & Alexandra
lender.loan_because: We would love to give people a chance to fulfill their dreams
